William Hill | Hoboken, NJ| Full-Time | Salary $120k - $200k | https://angel.co/william-hill-us-digital

Interested in bringing tech to sports betting? We are a small satellite of the massive London-based betting house William Hill, well equipped to create the future of sports betting. It’s a small group of us here in Hoboken, NJ. We are all about code optimization, performance driven architecture, and designing the ultimate user experience. We frequently go to NJ Devils and Knicks games, so we hope you love sports as much as we do. The best part is you’ll have the exposure, autonomy, and excitement of a startup, but the stability, expertise, (and funding of course) of William Hill. Come learn more about what we want to accomplish and get in the game with us!

Here are our open roles:

- Design Lead : https://angel.co/william-hill-us-digital/jobs/448408-design-...

- Backend Developer: https://angel.co/william-hill-us-digital/jobs/448409-back-en...

- Frontend Developer: https://angel.co/william-hill-us-digital/jobs/448425-front-e...

- Tech Lead: https://angel.co/william-hill-us-digital/jobs/448428-tech-le...

Tech Stack: Java, Scala, & React - if you can make it better, we will take your tech stack.

You can also send resumes to hiring@williamhill.us
